specifications.Care Advice: Regenerated > Modal This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location. Regenerated > Bamboo This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Blouses, Lining, Abaya
